title: Police reform in Congress; Plus water wars — Alex Moe, John Bresnahan and Bettina Boxall
description: The question of what happens next really moves from Minneapolis to Washington, where the issue of police reform is now in the hands of President Biden and Congress. Chuck is joined by co-founder of Punchbowl News, John Bresnahan and NBC News Capitol Hill producer and reporter, Alex Moe. Plus Bettina Boxall, staff writer at the LA Times covering water and the environment talks about water security.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
